DOC.brief_summary: Effective treatment nonspecific chronic neck pain clinical challenge . Patients randomize two group compare outcomes Global Postural Re-education ( GPR ) standard manual physical therapy respect pain , function , kinesiophobia , range motion , perceived effect , satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: GPR vs Manual PT Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: These study use two group : one receive GPR systematic method address musculoskeletal pain related functional deficit receive `` usual care '' manual PT individualize patient 's condition . Usual care include technique commonly use clinical practice select physical therapist initial examination . After nine week treatment , baseline measure re-evaluated . After conclusion first phase study , patient randomize `` usual care '' group cross-over receive GPR .
